name: Axel Hansen
overview:
Axel Hansen is the Co - Founder of Newsle.
He studied Computer Science at Harvard until April 2011, when he left to work on Newsle full-time. He has researched computer security at Dartmouth, where he published papers on network anomaly detection and smart fuzzing.
In summer 2010, he was a Software Engineering Intern at Google, where he worked on Chrome OS.
